member.name: M:GLSharp.Graphics.IGraphics.Clear
member.summary: Clears the drawing area using the clear mode set.

member.name: P:GLSharp.Graphics.IGraphics.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the drawing area.

member.name: P:GLSharp.Graphics.IGraphics.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the drawing area.

member.name: P:GLSharp.Graphics.IGraphics.ClearColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used for clearing.

member.name: P:GLSharp.Graphics.IGraphics.ClearMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the clear mode.
